description: Adds a Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) configuration to the application. Applications can use VPCs to store and access resources securely. Note the following about VPC configurations for Managed Service for Apache Flink applications:

parameters.name: ApplicationName
parameters.description: The name of an existing application.

parameters.name: VpcConfiguration
parameters.description: Description of the VPC to add to the application. The array of Subnet IDs used by the VPC configuration. (string) --- The array of SecurityGroup IDs used by the VPC configuration. (string) ---

nested_params.name: SubnetIds
nested_params.description: The array of Subnet IDs used by the VPC configuration.

nested_params.name: SecurityGroupIds
nested_params.description: The array of SecurityGroup IDs used by the VPC configuration.

nested_items.name: ApplicationVersionId
nested_items.description: Provides the current application version. Managed Service for Apache Flink updates the ApplicationVersionId each time you update the application.

nested_items.name: VpcConfigurationDescription
nested_items.description: The parameters of the new VPC configuration.

nested_items.name: VpcConfigurationId
nested_items.description: The ID of the VPC configuration.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: The ID of the associated VPC.

nested_items.name: SubnetIds
nested_items.description: The array of Subnet IDs used by the VPC configuration.

nested_items.name: SecurityGroupIds
nested_items.description: The array of SecurityGroup IDs used by the VPC configuration.
